entry.title: WIND WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: WSW 61 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or rain beginning late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
